attributes.action: Correcting the status of undocumented migrants in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: Correcting the status of undocumented immigrants in the United Kingdom who have not committed any bad or hostile behaviour in the country during the period in which they resided undocumented and who have been exploited by unscrupulous employers and exposed to violence, humiliation and discrimination in this society

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
